item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 27, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. AI Coding assistants provide little value because a programmer's job is to think (38 points | 29 comments)
2. Internet in a Box (83 points | 22 comments)
3. Show HN: I486SX_soft_FPU – Software FPU Emulator for NetBSD 10 on 486SX (8 points | 1 comment)

8. Libogc (Wii homebrew library) discovered to contain code stolen from RTEMS (129 points | 72 comments)
9. Reverse Geocoding Is Hard (149 points | 82 comments)
10. Thoughts Upon Slavery (1774) (10 points | 2 comments)

13. The Coming Knowledge-Work Supply-Chain Crisis (75 points | 44 comments)
14. Show HN: I created snapDOM to capture DOM nodes as images with exceptional speed (68 points | 31 comments)
15. Extend (YC W23) is hiring engineers to build LLM document processing ( | hide)
16. Unlocking Ractors: Object_id (42 points | discuss)

22. Mesmerizing Interlocking Geometric Patterns Produced with Japanese Woodworking (97 points | 18 comments)
23. Calibrations Have a Context-Collapse Problem (32 points | 6 comments)
24. How to program a text adventure in C (219 points | 40 comments)
25. Open-source interactive C tutorial in the browser (228 points | 43 comments)
26. How NASA Is Using Graph Technology and LLMs to Build a People Knowledge Graph (88 points | 25 comments)
27. Do Large Language Models know who did what to whom? (12 points | 1 comment)
28. Why "Learn to code" Failed [PolyMatter] [video] (6 points | 1 comment)
29. Icônes (273 points | 37 comments)
